docs.lead_paragraph: A man was killed and three people were injured in Brooklyn early Thursday when their car was hit by a stolen vehicle whose driver had been fleeing the police at speeds of up to 100 miles an hour, the authorities said.

headline.main: One Is Killed and Three Are Injured in Crash Involving Stolen Car Fleeing the Police
headline.print_headline: One Is Killed and Three Are Injured in Crash Involving Stolen Car Fleeing the Police

docs.snippet: A man was killed and three people were injured in Brooklyn early Thursday when their car was hit by a stolen vehicle whose driver had been fleeing the police at speeds of up to 100 miles an hour, the authorities said.

byline.contributor: Ann Farmer and Corey Kilgannon contributed reporting.
